title: The new work on 3rd street is looking good with one exception.  All the benches are being installed backwards.  I don\'t know about anyone else, but I would prefer to face the road and watch traffic go by than to face the side of a building. You wouldn\'t sit facing your house on your front porch, you would face the road. Why were they built that way?
